data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Kolé mavofodaiti ta-wuyei.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è undaanɛ vaa ɠɛɛni ɗa-yooi ʋɛ.
È ɗa-nuɓusɛiti ta-vaaɠaaza golaiti seɠeni ti unma,
Gi zei ʋele ɓɛtɛ ʋolu, ee, GALA, gi ɠizo nui!
Ɗa yɛsu yiiɠaawanazu gi ma, eyɛsu ɠɔ ɓaa?
È la kɛa, è ʋa zɛnvui ve gi ya ʋolu ɓaa,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai lɛ ga giye!
Nà pɔ gè woilo naa ma, nii GALA ge bosu, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI.
Ungo, nágo ʋe na, è ʋa naati kizo, niiti ti luazu ba,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɓɔɠɔi ɠa undaanɛɛi ve,
